refsect1.title: Signals
refsect1.synopsis: "add-item" : Run Last "changed" : Run Last "delete-item" : Run Last "move-item" : Run Last "resize-item" : Run Last "select-item" : Run Last "select-region" : Run Last

refsect2.title: GtkPlotCanvas
refsect2.para: The GtkPlotCanvas struct contains only private data. It should only be accessed through the functions described below.

refsect2.title: enum GtkPlotCanvasFlags
refsect2.para: Selection and DND mode of GtkPlotCanvas

refsect2.title: enum GtkPlotCanvasAction
enum GtkPlotCanvasFlag

warning.para: GtkPlotCanvasFlag has been deprecated since version 3.1.6 and should not be used in newly-written code. use GtkPlotCanvasChildFlags

refsect2.para: Deprecated, Used for GtkPlotCanvasChild. Use GtkPlotCanvasChildFlags instead.

refsect2.title: enum GtkPlotCanvasSelection
enum GtkPlotCanvasPos
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_OUT, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_IN, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_LEFT, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_RIGHT, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_TOP, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_BOTTOM, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_TOP_LEFT, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_TOP_RIGHT, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_BOTTOM_LEFT, GTK_PLOT_CANVAS_BOTTOM_RIGHT, } GtkPlotCanvasPos;

refsect2.title: GtkPlotCanvasChild
refsect2.para: The GtkPlotCanvasChild struct contains only private data. It should only be accessed through the functions described below.

refsect2.title: enum GtkPlotCanvasChildFlags
gtk_plot_canvas_new ()
gtk_plot_canvas_construct ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_plot_canvas_construct (GtkPlotCanvas *canvas, gint width, gint height, gdouble magnification);

refsect2.title: gtk_plot_canvas_grid_set_attributes ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_plot_canvas_grid_set_attributes (GtkPlotCanvas *canvas, GtkPlotLineStyle style, gint width, const GdkColor *color);

refsect2.title: gtk_plot_canvas_set_size ()
gtk_plot_canvas_get_pixel ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_plot_canvas_get_pixel (GtkPlotCanvas *canvas, gdouble px, gdouble py, gint *x, gint *y);

refsect2.title: gtk_plot_canvas_get_position ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_plot_canvas_get_position (GtkPlotCanvas *plot_canvas, gint x, gint y, gdouble *px, gdouble *py);

refsect2.title: gtk_plot_canvas_put_child ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_plot_canvas_put_child (GtkPlotCanvas *canvas, GtkPlotCanvasChild *child, gdouble x1, gdouble y1, gdouble x2, gdouble y2);

refsect2.title: gtk_plot_canvas_child_move ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_plot_canvas_child_move (GtkPlotCanvas *canvas, GtkPlotCanvasChild *child, gdouble x1, gdouble y1);

refsect2.title: gtk_plot_canvas_child_move_resize ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_plot_canvas_child_move_resize (GtkPlotCanvas *canvas, GtkPlotCanvasChild *child, gdouble x1, gdouble y1, gdouble x2, gdouble y2);

refsect2.title: gtk_plot_canvas_child_get_position ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gtk_plot_canvas_child_get_position (GtkPlotCanvas *canvas, GtkPlotCanvasChild *child, double *x1, double *y1, double *x2, double *y2);

refsect2.title: The "flags" property
refsect2.para: PlotCanvas flags control selection and DND, see GtkPlotCanvasFlags.

refsect2.title: The "add-item" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (GtkPlotCanvas *plotcanvas, GtkPlotCanvasChild *arg1, gpointer user_data) : Run Last

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
